process.upgrade_tips: If you are unable to access your router's web panel after the firmware upgrade, please try to clear the browser cache.
process.install_tips: Software installation will take a few minutes. Please do NOT refresh the page until it is finished.

process.revert_tips: Reseting Firmware takes about $$$$. All your current settings, applications and data will be cleared. Please do NOT refresh the page until it is finished.
